import React from 'react' import Product from '../products'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Col, Row, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; const ProductDetails = ({match}) => { const { id } = useParams(); const product = Product.find((p) => p._id === id); if (!product) { return
Product not found

 Price : ${product.price} {product.description} Status : {product.countInStock>0? 'In Stock':'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductDetails
